title: U.S. midterms a potential Russian target: DHS Secretary
text:
U.S. midterms a potential Russian target: DHS Secretary Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:53 
Not having a verifiable way to audit election results in some states represents a ''national security concern,'' the Trump administration's homeland security chief said on Wednesday, looking ahead to November midterm elections in the United States.   
Not having a verifiable way to audit election results in some states represents a "national security concern," the Trump administration's homeland security chief said on Wednesday, looking ahead to November midterm elections in the United States.  //reut.rs/2pwEhT3
